content.question: Which of the following is crucial to a stateâ€™s sovereignty?

choices.label: A one-party or dominant party system
The presence of democracy with free and fair elections
The right and power to govern itself without outside interference
State control over all media outlets, including the Internet

content.answer: The right and power to govern itself without outside interference

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
